Most importantly, the video's description explicitly states that the track was 'featured on the soundtrack for the 2007 film comedy “Hot Fuzz”', directly linking it to the movie context. It also has the highest views and likes among the official music videos, indicating its prominence and authenticity.
key_factors: Official music video from the artist's official channel.
Explicitly mentions 'Hot Fuzz' soundtrack in the description.
Perfect match of song title and performer.
High popularity (views and likes) compared to other official versions.
Full-length track duration.
